channel.title: Ps4 and xbox1
channel.description: "the lizard squad" hacked the psn and xbox networks because apparently christmas spirit is gone. what do you all think of this?

item.title: Ps4 and xbox1
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So a hacker group out hacks a hacker group, reporting the first hacker group.

Jesus christ now it’s just becoming a penis war. “I can hack you so I’m better”.

Read full topic

item.title: Ps4 and xbox1
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:18, topic:548730”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=667637.msg4465303#msg4465303 date=1419716612]
Oh look at that…

http://rt.com/news/217819-kim-dotcom-consoles-hackers/

Lmao… what the Hell…

I thought the whole Lizard Squad didn’t have anything to do with North Korea? I didn’t hear anything about them being apart of the NK hack because of Sony releasing that movie online and what not.

I’m honestly kind of surprised Xbox Live was taken down though, it was the first I believe, yes? While PSN has been taken down at least one/twice, and hacked three times I think?
[/quote]
They have nothing to do with the NK crap. They just wanted to “hop on the bandwagon” when all that shit happened.[/quote]
Alright, that’s what I thought - thanks.

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:19, topic:548730”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=667637.msg4465303#msg4465303 date=1419716612]
I’m honestly kind of surprised Xbox Live was taken down though, it was the first I believe, yes? While PSN has been taken down at least one/twice, and hacked three times I think?
[/quote]
Xbox live has trouble all the time. I don’t think it has ever dropped fully like this, but its lucky to go 2 days without a service failing[/quote]
I mean I know they’ve had problems here and there with certain services but I’ve never seen a time where their ENTIRE thing was down.

Read full topic

item.title: Ps4 and xbox1
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:13, topic:548730”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=667637.msg4465167#msg4465167 date=1419635509]

I still don’t understand why they would take down Sony and Microsoft over a movie being released? What are they 12?

Lizard squad has always acted childish when it came to them taking sites/games down. They act like the 12 y. old ragers on Halo 3. “omg you beat me now ima ddos you!”
[/quote]
They’re 15-18 yr old brits who just want followers on their twitter account.

PSN is still down and im fudgeing pissed, I wanna play COD:AW and Madden 15…[/quote]

I was playing with my bro a few hours ago, They did it again?

A hacking group called Lizard Squad has taken credit for a DDoS (distributed denial-of-service) attack on Twitter. That group's involvement cannot be verified.
Denial of service is hacking! :eek: :cool: ;D :D :) :cool:
